application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 3 (materials) comprising: Sample glazing with window/door frame(s); Balustrade and edge detail; Sample areas of brickwork and mortar; Additional details (MVHR Vent All Blocks) in relation to Plot 14 Reserved Matters Approval (LPA ref: 20/5690/RMA amended by 23/1877/NMA) block development only (as shown on Annex 2 Plot 14 Location relevant works area plan of the Cover letter), falling within Phase 2 (South) (Plots) of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the Comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood
